00045         bool isSeatRowLetterAvailable(int row, string letter)
00046         {
00047         bool available = true;
00048 
00049                 for (int i=0; i<bookings.size();i++){
00050                         if ((bookings.at(i).getSeatRow() == row )&& (bookings.at(i).getSeatLetter() == letter)) //check if letter is available
00051                                 available = false;
00052                 }
00053       return available;
00054 
00055         }
00056 
00057         bool isFull(){
00058                 int size = 1;
00059 
00060                 for (int row = 0; row <19; row++){
00061                         {
00062                                 if (!isSeatRowLetterAvailable(row,"a"))//is true
00063                                         size++;
00064                                 if (!isSeatRowLetterAvailable(row,"b"))
00065                                         size++;
00066                                 if (!isSeatRowLetterAvailable(row,"c"))
00067                                         size++;
00068                                 if (!isSeatRowLetterAvailable(row,"d"))
00069                                         size++;
00070                         }
00071         }
00072                 if (size >=(20*4)) //if  80+ people on place, then its a full plane
00073                         return true;
00074                 else
00075                         return false;
00076         }
